description.zh-cn: 原中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共青海、甘肃、江西三省省委书记，第十二届全国政协副主席。2017年，因犯受贿罪、滥用职权罪、巨额财产来源不明罪，被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A former politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former deputy national leader. He served as the Party Committee Secretary of Qinghai, Gansu, and Jiangxi provinces, and as a Vice Chairman of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC. In 2017, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, abuse of power, and possessing a huge amount of property from unknown sources.

description.zh-cn: 苏荣的第二任妻子，被称为“于姐”，活跃于江西政商界，后因苏荣案被调查。
description.en: Su Rong's second wife, known as 'Sister Yu', was active in Jiangxi's political and business circles and was later investigated in connection with Su Rong's case.

description.zh-cn: 苏荣的女婿，曾任湖南省有色金属管理局副局长、张家界市委常委、副市长。2015年11月被调查。
description.en: Su Rong's son-in-law, formerly served as Deputy Director of the Hunan Provincial Administration of Nonferrous Metals, and a member of the Standing Committee and Vice Mayor of Zhangjiajie. He was investigated in November 2015.

description.zh-cn: 原江西省新余市人大常委会主任。因向监察部举报苏荣夫妇而遭打击报复，被判处刑罚。
description.en: Former Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Xinyu City, Jiangxi Province. He faced retaliation and was sentenced after reporting Su Rong and his wife to the Ministry of Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委，后因严重腐败问题被查处。
description.en: Former member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, who was later investigated for serious corruption.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。被指与苏荣等人存在利益关系。
description.en: Former member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. He was alleged to have a community of interests with Su Rong and others.

description.zh-cn: 原江西新余市委书记，被指与苏荣、吴官正是利益共同体。
description.en: Former Party Secretary of Xinyu, Jiangxi, alleged to be part of a community of interests with Su Rong and Wu Guanzheng.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国副主席，曾兼任中共中央党校校长。
description.en: Former member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, Vice President of the People's Republic of China, and concurrently served as President of the Central Party School of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。在苏荣担任中共青海省委书记期间，任青海省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician. He served as Governor of Qinghai while Su Rong was the Party Secretary of Qinghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，曾率先举报苏荣的违纪违法问题。
description.en: A Chinese journalist who was among the first to report Su Rong's violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, serving as the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front.

nodes.id: 中国共产党江西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党江西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Jiangxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党甘肃省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党甘肃省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在甘肃省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Gansu Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党青海省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党青海省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在青海省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Qinghai Province.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训机构。
description.en: A training institution for officials directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省济南市的中级人民法院，对苏荣案进行了一审宣判。
description.en: The intermediate people's court of Jinan, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, which conducted the first-instance trial and sentencing in Su Rong's case.

description.zh-cn: 指对原中共中央政治局常委周永康及其相关人员的腐败调查案件。
description.en: Refers to the corruption investigation case against former Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang and his associates.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高法律监督机关。
description.en: The highest legal supervision organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 苏荣于1970年1月加入中国共产党，2015年2月16日被开除党籍。
description.en: Su Rong joined the Communist Party of China in January 1970 and was expelled from the party on February 16, 2015.

description.zh-cn: 在吉林大学经济管理学院国际经济系世界经济专业在职研究生学习，获经济学硕士学位。
description.en: Studied as an on-the-job postgraduate student in the World Economy major of the International Economics Department at the School of Economics and Management, Jilin University, and obtained a Master's degree in Economics.

relationships.target: 中国共产党青海省委员会
中国共产党甘肃省委员会

description.zh-cn: 苏荣担任中共中央党校常务副校长期间，时任校长是曾庆红。
description.en: When Su Rong served as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School of the CCP, the president was Zeng Qinghong.

relationships.target: 中国共产党江西省委员会
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 程丹峰是苏荣的女婿。
description.en: Cheng Danfeng is Su Rong's son-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 在苏荣担任中共青海省委书记期间，赵乐际任副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Su Rong was the Party Secretary of Qinghai, Zhao Leji served as Deputy Secretary and Governor.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 宣布对苏荣因涉嫌严重违纪违法问题进行组织调查，并于2015年2月16日决定给予其开除党籍、开除公职处分。
description.en: Announced an organizational investigation into Su Rong for suspected serious violations of discipline and law, and on February 16, 2015, decided to expel him from the party and public office.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

description.zh-cn: 依法决定对苏荣以涉嫌受贿罪立案侦查并采取强制措施。
description.en: Decided to file a case for investigation and take coercive measures against Su Rong on suspicion of bribery in accordance with the law.

description.zh-cn: 一审公开宣判，对苏荣以受贿罪、滥用职权罪、巨额财产来源不明罪判处无期徒刑。
description.en: In the first-instance public sentencing, Su Rong was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, abuse of power, and possessing a huge amount of property from unknown sources.

description.zh-cn: 周建华向监察部及相关领导举报苏荣夫妇的违法乱纪问题。
description.en: Zhou Jianhua reported the illegal activities of Su Rong and his wife to the Ministry of Supervision and other relevant leaders.

description.zh-cn: 周建华在举报苏荣后遭到打击报复，被中共江西省纪委“双规”，后被法院判刑。
description.en: After reporting Su Rong, Zhou Jianhua faced retaliation, was subjected to 'shuanggui' by the Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection, and was later sentenced by the court.

description.zh-cn: 据海外媒体报道，苏荣被认为是周永康集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: According to overseas media reports, Su Rong was considered one of the main members of the Zhou Yongkang clique.

description.zh-cn: 苏荣的落马被外界视为周永康案的一部分。
description.en: Su Rong's downfall was seen by outsiders as part of the Zhou Yongkang case.

description.zh-cn: 记者徐祥率先举报苏荣与吴官正、汪德和是利益共同体，存在钱权交易等问题。
description.en: Journalist Xu Xiang was the first to report that Su Rong, Wu Guanzheng, and Wang Dehe formed a community of interests involved in issues such as money-for-power transactions.

description.zh-cn: 被记者徐祥指与吴官正、汪德和是利益共同体，存在钱权交易等问题。
description.en: Accused by journalist Xu Xiang of forming a community of interests with Wu Guanzheng and Wang Dehe, involved in issues such as money-for-power transactions.

description.zh-cn: 被记者徐祥指与吴官正、汪德和是利益共同体，存在钱权交易等问题。
description.en: Accused by journalist Xu Xiang of forming a community of interests with Wu Guanzheng and Wang Dehe, involved in issues such as money-for-power transactions.
